channel.title: CoD Action-Adventure Genre?
channel.description:
Apparently Infinity Ward announced their upcoming plans for where the Call of Duty franchise will be taking us. It's going to be an action-adventure game.
source: http://www.talkingaboutgames.com/news/generalnews/5682-in-wake-of-infinity-ward-controversy-activision-announces-new-direction-for-call-of-duty

item.title: CoD Action-Adventure Genre?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

`Lewk_:

this is going to turn into a shittier fallout 3, and fallout 3 was pretty bad.

You are an idiot. That is all. :mad:

Read full topic

item.title: CoD Action-Adventure Genre?
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:12, topic:331902”]

It’s official afaik that the next game by Treyarch is Call of Duty: Vietnam if that’s what you’re asking, and trailers have been out for awhile.

I hope napalm is a killstreak, that would fit the theme so perfect.[/quote]teh trailers plox?

Read full topic

i hate mw2 its so f**king retarded. I was using a rpd with FMJ [gives more fire power] & stopping power [gives more fire power] and coundnt kill someone in a whole mag of ammo [100 bullets]

lag/you’re accuracy is terrible
[/quote]
Lag :D[/quote]
Lag has nothing to do with the game
Lag has everything to do with your connection

don’t reply and say
BUT I HAVE 999999999999999999999999999999 MBPS CONNECTION!!1one
